parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Ropes and Sling Loading

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns all ropes attached to a ropes owner transport in an [[Array]], otherwise an empty array <tt>[]</tt> is returned.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[ropes]] ropesOwner

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> ropesOwner: [[Object]] - a transport from which the ropes originate

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - array of the actual rope objects

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] ([[ropes]] [[vehicle]] [[player]]);</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_rope1 = ([[ropes]] heli1) [[select]] 0;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[canSlingLoad]], [[enableRopeAttach]], [[getSlingLoad]], [[ropeAttachedObjects]], [[ropeAttachTo]], [[ropeDestroy]], [[ropeLength]], [[ropeUnwound]], [[ropeAttachedTo]], [[ropeCreate]], [[ropeDetach]], [[ropeAttachEnabled]], [[ropeCut]], [[ropeEndPosition]], [[ropeUnwind]], [[setSlingLoad]], [[slingLoadAssistantShown]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">

<dd class="notedate">Posted on 05 April, 2014</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Waffle SS.|Waffle SS.]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
The [[ropes]] command seems to return each individual sling load rope.
[[ropes]] will return an empty [[Array]] if the sling load ropes are not deployed.
Ropes as of A3 1.33 have a cfgVehicles classname of "Rope".

</dl>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
